subject: p16553329
History: With confusion, for infx, eval for consolidation.
Findings: AP upright and lateral views of the chest provided. There is top-normal heart size with tiny left pleural effusion. Calcified nodular structures in the left upper lung and right mid to lower lung likely represent calcified granulomas. There is no evidence of pneumonia or CHF. Mediastinal contour stable. Bony structures intact.
Impression: Top normal heart size, tiny left effusion.
